Tactic EMV 500 Gadus S3 V220C 2 Germany EN 140001492039 EHS V1.0 29-AUG-2023

marketing: Shell Gadus S3 V220C greases are premium multi-purpose greases based on high viscosity index mineral oil and a lithium complex soap thickener. They contain the latest additives to offer excellent high temperature oxidation performance and other additives to enhance its anti-oxidation, anti-wear and anti-corrosion properties. Shell Gadus S3 V220C greases are especially suitable for bearings operating at high temperature and under load.
